<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="BottomMenuASkin" width="750" height="120" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Group x="0" y="0" width="750">
		<e:Image source="hall_bottom_bg1_png" y="10" x="0" anchorOffsetX="0" width="750"/>
		<e:Group x="20" y="0">
			<e:Image x="0" y="70" source="hall_bottom_bg2_png"/>
			<e:Image x="117" y="70" source="hall_bottom_bg2_png"/>
			<e:Image x="234" y="70" source="hall_bottom_bg2_png"/>
			<e:Image x="351" y="70" source="hall_bottom_bg2_png"/>
			<e:Image x="468" y="70" source="hall_bottom_bg2_png"/>
			<e:Image x="585" y="70" source="hall_bottom_bg2_png"/>
			<e:Button id="hall_friends" x="25.5" y="0">
				<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width.down="95%" height.down="95%" source="hall_friends_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
			<e:Button id="hall_mall" y="0" x="140">
				<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width.down="95%" height.down="95%" source="hall_mall_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
			<e:Button id="hall_record" y="0" x="259">
				<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width.down="95%" height.down="95%" source="hall_record_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
			<e:Button id="hall_knapsack" y="0" x="375">
				<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width.down="95%" height.down="95%" source="hall_knapsack_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
			<e:Button id="hall_share" y="0" x="491">
				<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width.down="95%" height.down="95%" source="hall_share_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
			<e:Button id="hall_more" y="0" x="609">
				<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width.down="95%" height.down="95%" source="hall_more_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="two_pop" x="345" y="-110" width="385" visible="false">
		<e:Image width="386" height="114" x="0" y="0" source="hall_di3_png" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scale9Grid="25,15,96,76"/>
		<e:Button id="hall_set" y="0" x="301">
			<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width.down="95%" height.down="95%" source="hall_set_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="hall_email" y="0" x="206">
			<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width.down="95%" height.down="95%" source="hall_email_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="hall_me" y="0" x="116">
			<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width.down="95%" height.down="95%" source="hall_me_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="hall_take" y="0" x="23">
			<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width.down="95%" height.down="95%" source="hall_take_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

				</e:Skin>

			</e:Button>
			<e:Button id="hall_knapsack1" y="0" x="491">
				<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width.down="95%" height.down="95%" source="hall_knapsack_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
			<e:Button id="hall_set1" y="0" x="609">
				<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width.down="95%" height.down="95%" source="hall_set_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="MessageBoxASkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<e:Image source="notice_panel_bg_png"/>
	<e:Image source="notice_room1_png" y="144" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
	<e:Button label="" y="220" horizontalCenter="0">

</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="MessageBoxBSkin" width="720" height="1280" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Group height="1280" width="720">
		<e:Image source="message_bg_png" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image source="message_bg0_png" y="434" scale9Grid="21,23,129,139" anchorOffsetX="0" width="640" anchorOffsetY="0" height="364" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image source="message_title_png" y="368" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image source="messageTitle_png" y="376" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image x="592" y="351" source="message_close_png"/>
		<e:Button id="closeBtn" label="" x="590" y="350">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%"  horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width.down="95%" height.down="95%" source="message_closeBtn_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="okBtn" label="确  定" y="825" width="179" height="78" horizontalCenter="0">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width.down="95%" height.down="95%" source="messageDetermine_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" textColor="0xfff3e3" bold="true" fontFamily="FZHTK" y="18" verticalAlign="justify" stroke="2" strokeColor="0x9f3c0c"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Label id="msgLabel" text="解散房间不扣房卡，是否确定解散？" y="444" anchorOffsetX="0" width="620" anchorOffsetY="0" height="339" horizontalCenter="0" verticalAlign="middle" fontFamily="FZHTK" size="26" textColor="0xfff3eb" textAlign="center" lineSpacing="20"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="MessageBoxCSkin" width="720" height="1280" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Group height="1280" width="720">
		<e:Image source="message_bg_png" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image source="message_bg0_png" y="448" scale9Grid="21,23,129,139" anchorOffsetX="0" width="640" anchorOffsetY="0" height="350" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image source="message_title_png" y="368" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image source="messageTitle_png" y="376" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image x="592" y="351" source="message_close_png"/>
		<e:Button id="closeBtn" label="" x="590" y="350">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width.down="95%" height.down="95%" source="message_closeBtn_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Label id="msgLabel" text="解散房间不扣房卡，是否确定解散？" y="458" anchorOffsetX="0" width="620" anchorOffsetY="0" height="325" horizontalCenter="0" verticalAlign="middle" fontFamily="FZHTK" size="26" textColor="0xfff3eb" textAlign="center"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="MessageBoxDSkin" width="720" height="1280" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="rule_bg_png" horizontalCenter="0" height="589" scale9Grid="86,34,516,785" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image y="376" horizontalCenter="0" source="rule_title_png"/>
	<e:Image y="385" horizontalCenter="0.5" source="com_warm_hint_png"/>
	<e:Image y="479" source="rule_bg1_png" horizontalCenter="0" scale9Grid="13,12,104,79" width="598" height="299"/>
	<e:Image x="589" y="349" source="set_close_png"/>
	<e:Button id="close" x="588" y="349">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="set_closeBtn_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Label id="msgLabel" y="566" textColor="0xFFF3EB" text="游戏即将开始，是否确定离开游戏？是真的？" horizontalCenter="0" width="500" height="172" lineSpacing="20"/>
	<e:Button id="okBtn" label="确定" x="130" y="820">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="com_quxiao_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="cancelBtn" label="取消" x="430" y="820">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="com_queding_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="DKGameSceneSkin" width="960" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
		<e:Image source="game_bg_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
		<e:Group bottom="0" right="40">
			<e:Image source="dikuang_tubiao_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
			<e:Button label="" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
				<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="xiaoxi_tubiao_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group left="40" top="40">
			<e:Image source="dikuang_tubiao_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
			<e:Button label="" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
				<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="likai_tubiao_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group right="40" top="40">
			<e:Image source="dikuang_tubiao_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
			<e:Button label="" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
				<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="shezhi-tubiao_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group x="884.01" y="69" anchorOffsetX="0">
			<e:Image source="kuang_png" right="0"/>
			<e:Image source="guizhekuang_png" right="74" verticalCenter="0"/>
